game.name: Ritualist
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: 《仪式使者》是一款设定于独特暗黑幻想世界的动态等轴动作Roguelike游戏。选择武器、精通战斗、直面死亡，同时揭开封印「原初存在」的古老仪式。你会在深渊侵蚀中生还，还是被永恒吞噬？
game.shortDescriptionEn: Ritualist is a dynamic isometric action-roguelike set in a unique dark fantasy world. Choose your weapons, master combat style, and face death as you uncover ancient rituals to seal away the Primordial Ones. Will you survive the descent, or will the Abyss claim you?
